title: Should the DAO join the Meka NFT Raffle?
body:
One liner: Buy “Meka” NFTs at the launch of the mekaverse through the to be announced raffle system.
 
•    Costs: 0.2 ETH per meka + gas fees. I’m proposing everyone in the DAO sign up for the raffle drop and we purchase as many Mekas as we can up to 3 (Or more if there's interest.) Details of the raffle are not available yet, but here’s what we know from the discord: 
o    “You will arrive on a beautifully designed landing page on launch day to register for a ticket. Once you've obtained your tickets, you'll be required to wait in a random queue where you may be chosen in order to mint a Meka. The probability of getting chosen will be determined by the amount of individuals that register for a ticket on launch day. With this method, there will be no Gas War! We will provide you with further information on the drop before the launch and in the days ahead. You can register for a maximum amount of two Mekas per individual. If you want to mint one, it is also an option. We will create an animated explainer video that will teach you exactly what you need to do to successfully mint a Meka! Keep an eye out for that!”

•    Potential benefits beyond owning a fancy NFT: Plans beyond NFTs including possible physical merch, future drops, etc. See roadmap on main website.

•    DROP DATE UPDATE - Rescheduled for October 6th at 11PM CET

•    Discord over 100k but only 8888k mekas (potential for huge demand right off the bat)
author: 0x3F0561EcdbD3959821dE8dcDB26272cA641BdbF0
